Name: The Avatar Legends
Overview:
The Avatar Legends is an epic RPG for XBOX 360 that lets players control their Avatars in an incredible world filled with epic quests, deadly beasts, and an arsenal of mindblowing weaponry.

It offers a robust 10+ hour singleplayer adventure, competitive/cooperative multiplayer, and most importantly.... ALL the tools we used to build the game, so you too can have the chance to create the adventure of your dreams!
